p:
BrQ capping of hemozoin crystals can also be confirmed by comparing the measured Br map ( Fig. 4 C ) and 2 simulated Br distributions: with and without BrQ capping hemozoin crystals ( Fig. 4 D and E , respectively). Other parasites with similar trend in Br distribution are shown in Fig. 3 and
SI Appendix, Fig. S6 .
